scripts.minify-js: terser public/scripts/home.js -o public/scripts/home.min.js && terser public/scripts/header_footer.js -o public/scripts/header_footer.min.js && terser public/scripts/blog.js -o public/scripts/blog.min.js && terser public/scripts/admin.js -o public/scripts/admin.min.js
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o public/styles/home.min.css public/styles/home.css && cleancss -o public/styles/header_footer.min.css public/styles/header_footer.css && cleancss -o public/styles/blog.min.css public/styles/blog.css && cleancss -o public/styles/admin-login.min.css public/styles/admin-login.css && cleancss -o public/styles/apropos.min.css public/styles/apropos.css
